[Page Title: Menus | Élevé]

SKIP TO CONTENT Menus 
Carefully Curated

Discover coastal-inspired cuisine through blazing flavors and inventive cocktails at Élevé.

[Page Title: Élevé | Rooftop Restaurants in Charleston | Official Site]

SKIP TO CONTENT Indulge inCoastal-Inspired Cuisine Scroll Down Charleston's Most Artful Dining Destination 
This is Élevé

A beacon for the unexpected and the avant-garde, Élevé was concocted for the curious. An elegant rooftop garden is the backdrop for inventive coastal cuisine with Southern heritage and rooted in French culinary techniques—think herbs from le jardin and signature gypsy twists to start. Refresh your mind and nourish your soul together, as you overlook the cobblestone streets of magical downtown Charleston.

HOURS OF OPERATION
Brunch: Saturday – Sunday, 10:00 am – 3:00 pm Monday - Friday, 11:00 am - 3:00 pm Lunch: Dinner: Daily, 5:00 pm – 10:00 pm 
Monday  Thursday, 11:00 am  11:00 pm
Bar Hours: – – 
Friday - Saturday, 10:00 am - 12:00 am

Sunday, 10:00 am  11:00 pm
– Happy Hour: , 2:00 pm – 5:00 pm Monday - Friday Our Creations 
Artful & Inspired

Handcrafted delicacies and a sumptuous setting—let inspiration feed you at Élevé as you explore the story that began it all through inspired cuisine, bright flavors, and inventive libations.
View Menus Private Dining 
Infused With Inspiration
Own every moment. With elegance, whimsy, and several distinct spaces to choose from, Élevé is a picture-perfect setting for private dinners and other intimate gatherings in Charleston. Contact Us
